p: On the plus side, geneticists as a group moved through the grieving process quite quickly. Within a year or two of the original individual GWA efforts collaborations were being formed and meta-analyses executed that indeed identified new genetic loci for disease [ 24, 25]. These collaborative groups formed the basis of large international consortia that now serve as discovery engines and large reference datasets in PD genetics. Thus, while we have not entirely gotten rid of the seven stages, they are certainly truncated and in large part can be efficiently dispatched.
